main.*: {{MessageBox | Message = For the original team created by [[Helmut Zemo (Earth-616)|Baron Zemo]], see: [[Thunderbolts (Earth-616)]] }} {{Marvel Database:Team Template | Image = Thunderbolts Vol 2 22 Christopher Variant Textless.jpg | ImageSize = 250px | Name = [[Thunderbolts]] | Aliases = The Selfish Avengers{{r|Deadpool: The Gauntlet Infinite Comic Vol 1 11}} | Status = Defunct | Identity = Secret | Reality = Earth-616 | BaseOfOperations = Formerly [[Petoskey Stone Diner]], [[Michigan (State)|Michigan]] | Leaders = Formerly [[Thaddeus Ross (Earth-616)|Red Hulk]] | CurrentMembers = | FormerMembers = [[Eugene Thompson (Earth-616)|Agent Venom]], [[Wade Wilson (Earth-616)|Deadpool]], [[Elektra Natchios (Earth-616)|Elektra]], [[Johnathon Blaze (Earth-616)|Ghost Rider]], [[Abigail Wright (Earth-616)|Mercy]], [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]], [[Thaddeus Ross (Earth-616)|Red Hulk]], [[Samuel Sterns (Earth-616)|Red Leader]] | Allies = [[Avengers (Earth-616)|Avengers]] | Enemies = [[Philip Sterns (Earth-616)|Madman]], [[Nobili Family (Earth-616)|Nobili Family]], [[Abigail Wright (Earth-616)|Mercy]], [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]] | Origin = | PlaceOfFormation = | PlaceOfDissolution = | Creators = Daniel Way; Steve Dillon | First = Thunderbolts Vol 2 1 | Last = Thunderbolts Vol 2 31 | HistoryText = In the aftermath of the [[Avengers vs. X-Men (Event)|Phoenix War]], [[Thaddeus Ross (Earth-616)|Thunderbolt Ross]], a.k.a. the [[Red Hulk]], assembled a strike-team with a composition very similar to the defunct [[Code Red (Earth-616)|Code Red]], including himself, the [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]], [[Wade Wilson (Earth-616)|Deadpool]], [[Elektra Natchios (Earth-616)|Elektra]], [[Eugene Thompson (Earth-616)|Agent Venom]], and others. He gathered these anti-heroes in order to fight an infection of targets under the ethos that if they cannot be cured, then they had to be "cut out". A new team of '''Thunderbolts''', modeled after [[James Howlett (Earth-616)|Wolverine]]'s [[X-Force (Strike Team) (Earth-616)|X-Force]], ready to do bad things for a good purpose.{{r|Thunderbolts Vol 2 1}} | Equipment = | Transportation = Submarine | Weapons = Katanas, [[Elektra's Twin Sai|sai]], guns | Notes = | Trivia = | Links = }}
